shadow.name: DISCORD
shadow.description: Fear of intimacy disguised as discernment, isolation
shadow.behavioral_signature: Keeping everyone at arm's length, chronic skepticism
shadow.thought_pattern: People will disappoint me. Better to stay alone.
shadow.emotional_state: Loneliness masked as preference for solitude

gift.name: LISTENING
gift.description: Deep empathic listening that allows others to be fully seen
gift.thought_pattern: I hear what's beneath the words. I witness without fixing.

siddhi.name: EMPATHY
siddhi.description: Feeling into the shared human experience, no separation
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Others feel completely understood in your presence
siddhi.thought_pattern: Your pain is my pain. Your joy is my joy.

inversion_protocols.script: Your isolation is not wisdomâ€”it is a defense against potential pain. The G center's role is to magnetize the right people. You cannot discern who is right without allowing people close enough to be witnessed. Listening is not agreeing. Empathy is not merging. You can be with someone fully and remain yourself.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Place hand on heart. Feel the tightness. Breathe into it. Ask: 'What am I protecting?'

experiment.hypothesis: If I listen deeply to 3 people without offering advice or judgment, connection will emerge.
experiment.action: Have 3 conversations where you only listen. Reflect back what you hear. Do not fix or advise.

success_criteria.target: At least one person says 'I feel really heard by you'
